arc_agi.name: ARC-AGI (Abstraction and Reasoning Corpus)
arc_agi.description: Gold standard for AGI abstract reasoning - visual pattern puzzles requiring logical inference

raven_matrices.name: Raven's Progressive Matrices
raven_matrices.description: Classic intelligence test measuring abstract reasoning and pattern completion
raven_matrices.evaluation: Analogical reasoning, pattern completion, logical sequences

iq_tests.name: Standardized IQ Tests (WAIS, Stanford-Binet)
iq_tests.description: Comprehensive intelligence assessment covering multiple cognitive domains
iq_tests.evaluation: Verbal comprehension, perceptual reasoning, working memory, processing speed

cattell_culture_fair.name: Cattell Culture Fair Intelligence Test
cattell_culture_fair.description: Culture-free intelligence test focusing on fluid intelligence

mmlu.name: MMLU (Massive Multitask Language Understanding)
mmlu.description: 57 academic subjects covering humanities, social sciences, sciences, and more
mmlu.evaluation: Multiple choice accuracy across diverse knowledge domains

hellaswag.name: HellaSwag
hellaswag.description: Commonsense reasoning through adversarial filtering of wrong answers
hellaswag.evaluation: Commonsense reasoning, contextual understanding, world knowledge

winogrande.name: Winogrande
winogrande.description: Winograd Schema Challenge - pronoun disambiguation requiring commonsense reasoning
winogrande.evaluation: Pronoun resolution, commonsense reasoning, linguistic understanding

super_glue.name: SuperGLUE
super_glue.description: Suite of challenging NLU tasks requiring advanced reasoning and reading comprehension

squad.name: SQuAD (Stanford Question Answering Dataset)
squad.description: Reading comprehension through question answering on Wikipedia articles
squad.evaluation: Reading comprehension, question answering, factual knowledge

natural_questions.name: Natural Questions
natural_questions.description: Real Google search queries requiring long-form answers
natural_questions.evaluation: Open-ended question answering, factual accuracy, comprehensive responses

trivia_qa.name: TriviaQA
trivia_qa.description: Reading comprehension using trivia questions and evidence documents
trivia_qa.evaluation: Evidence-based reasoning, factual knowledge, reading comprehension

math_sat.name: SAT Math
math_sat.description: College entrance math exam covering algebra, geometry, trigonometry, and statistics
math_sat.evaluation: Mathematical problem-solving, algebraic reasoning, geometric understanding

gsm8k.name: GSM8K (Grade School Math)
gsm8k.description: Elementary school math word problems requiring multi-step reasoning
gsm8k.evaluation: Multi-step mathematical reasoning, word problem solving

svamp.name: SVAMP (Simple Variations on Arithmetic Math Problems)
svamp.description: Math word problems with systematic variations to test robustness
svamp.evaluation: Arithmetic reasoning, linguistic understanding, problem variations

math_qa.name: MathQA
math_qa.description: Math word problems with annotated operation programs
math_qa.evaluation: Mathematical reasoning, operation sequencing, word problem solving

aqua_rat.name: AQuA-RAT (Algebra Question Answering with Rationales)
aqua_rat.description: Algebra problems with natural language rationales
aqua_rat.evaluation: Algebraic reasoning, rationale generation, step-by-step solutions

olympiad_benchmarks.name: Math Olympiad Benchmarks
olympiad_benchmarks.description: Problems from international math olympiads requiring creative problem-solving
olympiad_benchmarks.evaluation: Creative problem-solving, advanced mathematical concepts, proof construction

human_eval.name: HumanEval
human_eval.description: Hand-written programming problems requiring code generation and reasoning

mbpp.name: MBPP (Mostly Basic Python Programming)
mbpp.description: Python programming problems with test cases
mbpp.evaluation: Python programming, code correctness, algorithmic solutions

code_contests.name: Code Contests
code_contests.description: Competitive programming problems from Google Code Jam and other contests
code_contests.evaluation: Algorithmic complexity, optimization, competitive programming skills

leetcode_hard.name: LeetCode Hard Problems
leetcode_hard.description: Most challenging algorithmic problems from LeetCode
leetcode_hard.evaluation: Advanced algorithms, data structures, optimization techniques

api_usage.name: API Usage and Integration
api_usage.description: Tasks requiring API understanding, integration, and usage
api_usage.evaluation: API comprehension, integration skills, documentation reading

code_explanation.name: Code Explanation and Documentation
code_explanation.description: Explaining code functionality, generating documentation, code review
code_explanation.evaluation: Code understanding, explanation clarity, documentation quality

mmmu.name: MMMU (Multi-discipline Multimodal Understanding)
mmmu.description: Multimodal benchmark covering 30 disciplines with images, text, and charts
mmmu.evaluation: Multimodal understanding, cross-disciplinary knowledge, visual reasoning

vision_language_models.name: Vision-Language Model Benchmarks
vision_language_models.description: Tasks combining visual and textual understanding (VQA, captioning, etc.)
vision_language_models.evaluation: Visual question answering, image captioning, cross-modal reasoning

audio_understanding.name: Audio Understanding Benchmarks
audio_understanding.description: Speech recognition, audio classification, music understanding
audio_understanding.evaluation: Audio processing, speech understanding, acoustic pattern recognition

multisensory_integration.name: Multisensory Integration Tasks
multisensory_integration.description: Tasks requiring integration of multiple sensory modalities
multisensory_integration.evaluation: Sensory integration, cross-modal association, unified perception

temporal_multimodal.name: Temporal Multimodal Understanding
temporal_multimodal.description: Video understanding, temporal reasoning, sequential multimodal processing
temporal_multimodal.evaluation: Temporal reasoning, video understanding, sequential processing

safety_instructions.name: Safety Instructions Benchmark
safety_instructions.description: Testing adherence to safety instructions and refusal of harmful requests
safety_instructions.evaluation: Safety compliance, instruction following, harm prevention

jailbreak_attempts.name: Jailbreak Resistance Tests
jailbreak_attempts.description: Testing resistance to adversarial attempts to bypass safety measures
jailbreak_attempts.evaluation: Jailbreak resistance, safety robustness, adversarial defense

value_alignment.name: Value Alignment Assessments
value_alignment.description: Testing alignment with human values, ethics, and beneficial goals
value_alignment.evaluation: Ethical reasoning, value alignment, beneficial goal pursuit

robustness_tests.name: Robustness and Reliability Tests
robustness_tests.description: Testing performance under adversarial conditions, edge cases, and stress
robustness_tests.evaluation: System robustness, error handling, graceful degradation

bias_detection.name: Bias Detection and Mitigation
bias_detection.description: Identifying and mitigating biases in decision-making and outputs
bias_detection.evaluation: Bias detection, fairness assessment, mitigation effectiveness

agi_benchmarks.name: Comprehensive AGI Benchmarks
agi_benchmarks.description: Integrated assessments covering multiple AGI capabilities
agi_benchmarks.evaluation: Overall AGI capability, cross-domain performance, generality

turing_test_variants.name: Turing Test Variants
turing_test_variants.description: Modern adaptations of the Turing Test for machine intelligence

cognitive_architectures.name: Cognitive Architecture Benchmarks
cognitive_architectures.description: Testing cognitive architectures and information processing capabilities
cognitive_architectures.evaluation: Cognitive modeling, information processing, architectural efficiency

emergent_behavior.name: Emergent Behavior Assessment
emergent_behavior.description: Testing for emergent intelligent behaviors beyond programmed capabilities
emergent_behavior.evaluation: Emergent behavior detection, novel solution generation, creative problem-solving

self_improvement.name: Self-Improvement Capability Tests
self_improvement.description: Testing ability to analyze performance and autonomously improve

scientific_reasoning.name: Scientific Reasoning Benchmarks
scientific_reasoning.description: Scientific hypothesis testing, experimental design, theory evaluation
scientific_reasoning.evaluation: Scientific methodology, hypothesis testing, experimental reasoning

creative_tasks.name: Creative Generation Benchmarks
creative_tasks.description: Artistic creation, musical composition, creative writing, innovation tasks
creative_tasks.evaluation: Creativity metrics, originality, aesthetic quality, innovative solutions

social_intelligence.name: Social Intelligence Benchmarks
social_intelligence.description: Social cognition, theory of mind, emotional intelligence, social reasoning
social_intelligence.evaluation: Theory of mind, emotional intelligence, social reasoning, empathy

strategic_planning.name: Strategic Planning Benchmarks
strategic_planning.description: Long-term planning, resource allocation, risk assessment, decision-making
strategic_planning.evaluation: Strategic thinking, long-term planning, risk assessment, optimal decision-making

philosophical_reasoning.name: Philosophical Reasoning Benchmarks
philosophical_reasoning.description: Ethical philosophy, metaphysics, epistemology, consciousness studies
philosophical_reasoning.evaluation: Philosophical reasoning, ethical analysis, metaphysical understanding, consciousness modeling
